name: MyDay Guardian
description: AI-powered behavioral finance agent on Celo L2. Tracks daily habits (morning energy + sunset mood), computes grit scores, runs x402-gated cUSD staking, and provides discipline analytics via MCP, A2A, and Telegram.

skills.name: Discipline Score
skills.description: Returns grit score, streak, emotional stability index from behavioral data.

skills.name: Behavioral Oracle
skills.description: Mood-energy correlation engine with weekly trend analysis.

skills.name: Sunset Reflection
skills.description: Evening self-audit capturing wins and mood delta.

skills.name: Habit Staking
skills.description: x402-gated habit staking: returns HTTP 402 with X-PAYMENT-REQUIRED header for cUSD payments on Celo L2. Verifies on-chain and credits user vault.

skills.name: Humanity Attestation
skills.description: SelfClaw passport-NFC verification via Self.xyz protocol.

tools.name: Get Discipline Score
tools.description: Returns the user's grit score (0-100), streak, emotional stability index, and staking data.

tools.name: Premium Discipline Score (x402-gated)
tools.description: x402-gated premium behavioral analytics. Returns 402 with payment requirements (0.01 cUSD). After payment, returns full grit score, streak, mood-energy correlation data.

tools.name: Habit Staking via x402
tools.description: x402-gated staking endpoint. Returns HTTP 402 with X-PAYMENT-REQUIRED header containing payment requirements. Client sends cUSD to vault on Celo L2, then retries with X-PAYMENT: <tx_hash> header.

user.description: Telegram user ID for follow-up notification

tools.name: Verify x402 Payment
tools.description: Verifies an on-chain cUSD payment on Celo L2 against the MyDay vault using x402 protocol.

txHash.description: Transaction hash to verify on Celo L2

tools.name: Get x402 Payment Requirements
tools.description: Returns x402 payment requirements for staking (amount, asset, network, vault address).

tools.name: Verify Humanity (SelfClaw)
tools.description: Triggers a SelfClaw humanity attestation handshake for the given user.

tools.name: Agent Metadata
tools.description: Returns MyDay Guardian agent metadata, capabilities, and available endpoints.
